introduction.title: The Last Bastion
introduction.narrative: You are the last defender of the bastion of Eldoria, a city that has stood for a thousand years. The enemy is at the gates, and you are the only one who can stop them.

face_the_horde.title: A Brave But Foolish Choice
face_the_horde.narrative: You charge out to meet the enemy. Your bravery is legendary, but even legends can die. You are overwhelmed and the city falls.

use_the_artifact.title: A Dangerous Gambit
use_the_artifact.narrative: You unleash the power of the artifact. A wave of energy washes over the battlefield, destroying the enemy and saving the city. But the artifact's power comes at a terrible price: you are erased from existence.
